thread.title: Stay Away - Under Construction
thread.title_full: Stay Away - Under Construction - Review of The Trafalgar Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DisappointedCowfolk
title: Stay Away - Under Construction
text: I used to stay at the Trafalgar a lot because of the location and satisfactory rooms and hotel amenities. However, I won't be staying there again. The hotel has been under construction for a very long time, so there has been no fitness center for the last year and there is construction noise between the hours of about 8am and 6pm. There are also funny smells throughout the hotels and in the rooms.
